item.title: The Liar Princess and the Blind Prince for PC launches March 11
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Currently available for PlayStation 4 and Switch.

The PC version of adventure game The Liar Princess and the Blind Prince via Steam on March 11, NIS America announced.

The Liar Princess and the Blind Prince first launched for PlayStation 4, Switch, and PS Vita on May 31, 2018 in Japan, followed by PlayStation 4 and Switch on February 12, 2019 worldwide. iOS and Android versions were released on May 29, 2020 in Japan.

Here is an overview of the game, via NIS America:

About

Deep in the forest, a solitary wolf sings. Charmed by this beautiful voice, a curious prince follows its song only to find and startle the wolf, who blinds him. Together, they embark on a journey to restore his sight. But every gift has a price in this storybook tale of love and loss.

The Liar Princess and the Blind Prince follows the tale of two lonely hearts brought together through a mutual misunderstanding. In it, you control the wolf, disguised as a princess who guides the blind prince through a perilous forest in search of the witch capable of restoring his sight. The forest is home to a number of hostile creatures intent on ending your journey prematurely, as well as hazardous traps that put the prince in danger.

Switch between wolf and princess form to dispatch your foes and guide the prince carefully as a princess to ensure his safety, in search of a fairytale ending.

Key Features

  • Unleash Your Inner Monster – Transform at will from a princess into a wolf to guide the blind prince towards a cure. Weave through the dangerous forest, but be careful…the forest is no place for a blind prince.
  • Brute Strength Meets Sharp Wit – Various obstacles will require the wolf’s strength, and others will require the princess’s wit. With so many traps and perilous hurdles that await, can the two make it safely to their final destination?
  • Lost Pages from a Forgotten Tale – With each delicate petal comes a fragment of memories shared by the wolf and the prince. Collect them along your journey and paint a vivid story of tragedy, love, and loss.

Watch a new trailer below.

PC Release Date Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2026/02/the-liar-princess-and-the-blind-prince-for-pc-launches-march-11

item.title: Hunt the Night for PS5, Xbox Series, and Switch launches February 26
item.content:encoded:
• PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox Series

Retro-style action RPG dated for consoles.

Retro-style gothic fantasy action RPG Hunt the Night will launch digitally for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and Switch on February 26, publisher DANGEN Entertainment and developer Moonlight Games announced. Physical editions distributed by Selecta Play will follow for PlayStation 5 and Switch this summer.

Hunt the Night first launched for PC via Steam and GOG on April 13, 2023.

Here is an overview of the game, via DANGEN Entertainment:

Story

Hunt the Night is a retro-style action RPG that blends fast, skillful combat with dark fantasy lore. Play as Vesper, a member of the Stalkers, and traverse the ruined world of Medhram on a mission to save humanity from a deadly cycle of annihilation. Endure nightmarish overworlds, slash through horrific dungeons, face brutal bosses, and wield an arsenal of powers in a relentless struggle against the Night itself.

It is the 9th Age of humanity. The cycle of day is ruled by humans, the night one by horrid creatures. Despite its efforts, humanity is annihilated with every arrival of the Night.

A group of humans, calling themselves “The Stalkers,” discovered how to use the power of darkness to their advantage and fought the Night. However, it was not enough, and with every new dawn humanity rose again knowing that, with darkness, comes extinction.

Humanity found the “Seal of Night,” an artifact that allowed them to stop the cycle in an everlasting day. In exchange for a blood oath that The Stalkers were willing to pay, the sun ruled for hundreds of generations and, for the first time, hope was a beacon of light. Yet fate proved unstoppable, and they paid the ultimate price.

Now, as the Night starts devouring every single glint of light, Vesper, a Stalker by right and daughter of the traitor, will travel a dying land trying to save the last embers of humanity. She hunts in a race against destiny, as the shadows lengthen both in the world and in her mind.

Key Features

  • Engage in Fast-Paced Dynamic Combat – Dash through enemies while you unleash your combos, use your weapons or destroy them with your dark powers. You can switch between melee and ranged attack in quick succession: slashing enemies with your sword and then dashing away to use your ranged weapons, avoiding enemy attacks.
  • Face Intense Challenging Bosses – Endure the ultimate challenge as you fight the ancient horrors of the Night that have been annihilating humanity over and over in intense boss battles. Learn their weak points, attack patterns and survive through the different combat phases as the battle gets more challenging and extreme.
  • Upgrade and Customize Vesper’s Build – Create your own build that will adapt not only to your preferred gameplay but also to particular bosses. Customize the upgrades of your arsenal and use the equipment that best suits your gameplay: Critical Damage, Life Steal, Poison, Close Combat, Firepower and more. Collect Sanguine vials, Crow Feathers, Moonstones and Noctilium to increase your stats and get ready to face the Night.
  • Discover the Dark World of Medhram – Explore Medhram in a combination of action–adventure and dark fantasy lore. Survive huge dungeons full of traps, enemies, puzzles and challenges. Discover all kinds of locations, from ancient cathedrals and libraries of knowledge to lost kingdoms and devastated floating cities.
  • Complete ‘Hunts’ as a Member of the Stalkers – Accept a hunt at ‘Crow’s Nest’ and track down the dark beast, find where it hides and hunt the most powerful creatures of the Night. After every completed hunt you will get rewards that will increase your health and dark energy bar.
  • Follow Questlines for Secondary Characters – Meet new characters and open full questlines that will vary depending on your actions: deciding to help them or not, finding them at their next location, failing to achieve the mission requirements in time… Everything counts!
  • Play to Adapted and Immersive Music – Immersive and adapted music to every moment, boss and location, with the collaboration of Hiroki Kikuta, Secret of Mana composer.

Watch a new set of trailers below.

Consoles Release Date Trailer

Physical Edition Announce Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2026/02/hunt-the-night-for-ps5-xbox-series-and-switch-launches-february-26

item.title: AI LIMIT DLC ‘Eirene’s Furnace of War’ announced
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5

Due out on March 27.

Publisher CE-Asia and developer SenseGames have announced AI LIMIT downloadable content “Eirene’s Furnace of War,” which adds new story, areas, and bosses. It will launch on March 27.

Here is an overview of the downloadable content, via CE-Asia:

“Eirene’s Furnace of War” continues the story of AI LIMIT following the ending of the main game, as Blader Arrisa embarks on a new chapter of her journey. Venturing into the Temple of War to face the trials set forth by Eirene the Warfare Bishop, players will face off against a mysterious new boss, as well as returning bosses that have been reworked with new mechanics to pose a greater challenge to seasoned Soulslike players.

The downloadable content expansion will also add brand new weapons, armor, Spells, and Seals, which can be obtained while playing through Eirene’s Furnace of War, offering players expanded build options and combat strategies to take into the new Furnace Arena. Players can look forward to more information on Eirene’s Furnace of War being shared in the coming months.

Since its launch in 2025, AI LIMIT has been praised for its distinct art style, memorable characters, and fast-paced Soulslike combat set across intricately designed levels. The game currently holds a 92 percent “Very Positive” rating from over 32,000 user reviews on Steam, making it CE-Asia’s most successful global release to date.

AI LIMIT is available now for PlayStation 5 and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store.

Watch a new trailer below. View a new set of images at the gallery.

DLC “Eirene’s Furnace of War” Announce Trailer

item.title: Hono Gurashi no Niwa main trailer, latest details and screenshots
item.content:encoded:
Nippon Ichi Software has released a new trailer for rural life simulation game Hono Gurashi no Niwa, as well as new information and screenshots introducing the village’s ancient rules and “things” encountered late at night.

■ Summary

This is Kagatsu Village, a small, quiet village nestled deep in the mountains.

The young protagonist was wandering through the mountains when they were rescued by nearby villagers, and on this land they began a new life.

They tend a neglected garden, grow crops, and sometimes go on leisurely fishing trips…

Time passes peacefully and quietly in Kagatsu Village.

However, strange events begin to occur in this peaceful village.

The fathomless rules of Kagatsu Village are enforced, the villagers stubbornly keep quiet, and signs of someone encroaching upon everyday life begin to appear.

As each day passes, the mysteries of this land slowly come to light.

Will the protagonist be able to uncover the village’s dark secrets and become a “true villager”?

■ A Faint Uneasiness Lingers in Calm Conversation

The villagers are all gentle and kind. But at unexpected moments, they utter words that catch your attention. As an outsider, the protagonist is told nothing more. The true meaning of their words remains unclear, leaving behind a lingering sense of unease.

The closer you grow to them, the more they may begin to open up. However, the village’s “secret” seems to be rooted deep within.

—The villagers whisper amongst themselves so the protagonist cannot hear. It seems there are topics they do not want the protagonist to overhear.

—They speak vaguely and never touch upon the core of the matter. The protagonist may sometimes feel as if they are being “kept in the dark.”

■ The Eight Rules of Kagatsu Village

Kagatsu Village has a long history, and certain ancient customs still remain today. When the protagonist settles into the village, they are told they must abide by “The Eight Rules of Kagatsu Village.”

“Do not approach strangers.”

“Do not seek out lost items.”

The reasons behind these rules are a mystery.

The village chief explains that “these rules are meant to protect the village’s prosperous way of life,” but…

—The villagers speak in threatening ways to prevent you from breaking the rules.

—Following the rules appears to be something deeply ingrained in the villagers’ way of life..

—Some villagers seem to break the rules and wander around at night. What could be the reason behind this…?

Kagatsu Village Late at Night Is Much Different from Daytime

Despite there being no one else out, you may feel the presence of someone behind you. Even so, wandering the village late at night may bring you closer to uncovering the mysteries the villagers have kept hidden.

Summon your courage, break the rules, and step into the darkness of Kagatsu Village.

—Don’t forget your flashlight when exploring late at night.

—Late at night, you may come across unfamiliar lost items. Some of them might prove useful in your everyday life.

■ Late-Night Encounters in Kagatsu Village

Late at night, you will encounter beings that cannot be explained as mere extensions of daily life. Are they dangerous? Or do they simply exist?

The answers will gradually reveal themselves as you explore the village at night.

■ “Safe Living Mode”

By selecting “Safe Living Mode,” you can enjoy daytime village life while continuing to follow the rules. Even players who are not fond of scary experiences can focus on life simulation and spend each day peacefully.

■ Main Trailer

The newly released main trailer for Hono Gurashi no Niwa depicts Kagatsu Village as it truly is—shifting from its warm daytime atmosphere, to suspicious villagers and the “things” encountered late at night.

Come witness the previously unrevealed side of Kagatsu Village, along with the main theme.



https://www.gematsu.com/2026/02/hono-gurashi-no-niwa-main-trailer-latest-details-and-screenshots
